info.title: Users and authentication
info.description: A service that manages users and authentication to various services

post.description: Attaches a Amazon account to an existing user account, returns the URL the browser should be redirected to
Detaches a Amazon account from an existing user account.

get.description: Gets the URL the front-end should redirect the browser to in order to be authenticated with Amazon, to be logged in

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: A merge token for merging into an account

get.description: The endpoint that Amazon redirects the browser to after the user has authenticated

post.description: Registers a new account with the system, with Amazon as the login system

get.description: Gets the URL the front-end should redirect the browser to in order to be authenticated with Amazon, and then register

post.description: Changes the user's current password to a new one, also adds a password to the account if there is none

get.description: Deletes all the sessions that have expired
Cleans old login tokens from the database
Cleans old account merge tokens from the database

Removes using a password as a login method
Send an email to user to get a password reset, responds with no content even if the email is not on any user account

parameters.description: Email of the account to send a password reset

parameters.name: redirect-url
parameters.description: URL to redirect to from the user's email link

parameters.description: Parameters to add/remove a newsletter subscriber

parameters.description: The ID of the requested user. If this is not provided, get currently logged in user

parameters.description: whether admin is requesting this deactivation

parameters.description: id of the user to be deactivated when admin is deactivating a user

get.description: Get all users
Returns whether Oauth is attached or not

parameters.description: The ID of the requested user. If this is not provide, get currently logged in user

parameters.description: The email of the requested user.

Auth-Status.title: Mediatype identifier: auth-status; view=default

facebook.description: True if user has facebook Oauth signin

google.description: True if user has google Oauth signin

linkedin.description: True if user has linkedin Oauth signin

microsoft.description: True if user has microsoft Oauth signin

standard.description: True if user has password signin

twitter.description: True if user has twitter Oauth signin
